facts.text: Adidas was the kit manufacturer for the team from 1996 to 2000.
The team's shirt sponsor from 2017 to 2019 was Acura.
Nationwide Children's Hospital was the shirt sponsor for the team in 2020.
The team won the MLS Cup in the years 2008, 2020, and 2023.
The team's Supporters' Shield victories occurred in 2004, 2008, and 2009.
The team won the U.S. Open Cup in 2002.
The Leagues Cup was won by the team in 2024.
The Campeones Cup was won by the team in 2021.
Gyasi Zardes was the top goalscorer for the team in 2020 with 15 goals.
Lucas Zelarayán was the top goalscorer for the team in 2021 with 13 goals.
Cucho Hernández was the top goalscorer for the team in 2023 with 24 goals.
Wilfried Nancy became the head coach of the team on December 6, 2022.
Issa Tall has been serving as the General Manager of the team since 2024.
In which year did Columbus Crew first participate in the CONCACAF Giants Cup?
Columbus Crew won their first match in the CONCACAF Champions' Cup against which team?
Árabe Unido in 2003
What was Columbus Crew's final standing in the 2009-10 CONCACAF Champions League Group C?
2nd
Columbus Crew reached the quarterfinals of the CONCACAF Champions League in which season before being eliminated by Real Salt Lake?
In what year did Columbus Crew win the Campeones Cup?
Columbus Crew were runners-up in the CONCACAF Champions Cup in which year?
Who was Columbus Crew's top scorer in 2024 with 25 goals?
Cucho Hernández
Which player holds the record for the most total appearances for Columbus Crew, with 277 appearances between 2004 and 2013?
Chad Marshall
Brian McBride scored how many goals for Columbus Crew in MLS matches?
62 goals
Who is the top assist provider in Columbus Crew's history, with 71 assists?
Robert Warzycha
William Hesmer had the highest total appearances from 2007–2012 with 45 for Kansas City Wizards.
Cucho Hernández is signed with Watford from 2022 to 2025, making a total of 38 appearances.
Zack Steffen made 26 appearances for SC Freiburg from 2016 to 2019.
Federico Higuaín was recognized in 2013 in the list of notable players by season.
Darlington Nagbe has been recognized from 2023 onwards in the list of notable players by season.
The highest regular season attendance recorded was 20,646 in 2024.
The lowest regular season attendance recorded due to COVID-19 restrictions was 4,138 in 2020.
The highest playoff attendance recorded was 20,807 in 1996.
The attendance was capped at 1,500 during the playoffs in 2020 due to COVID restrictions.
